analytic.title: Historia Zosimi de Vita Beatorum Rechabitarum. Édition de la version syriaque brève

biblStruct.note: Critical edition of the short recension of the Syriac translation of the Story of Zosimus about the Rechabites (Historia Zosimi de Vita Beatorum Rechabitarum, Clavis Apocr. Vet. Test., n. 166). Critics on the former edition of Fr. Nau (1899). Edition based on seven manuscripts: Paris, BnF, syr. 235; syr. 236; London, Brit. Libr., Add. 12174; Mardin, Forty Martyrs 257; Forty Martyrs 261; Charfet, Rahmani 19; Rahmani 132. Syriac text with apparatus, and French translation with philological commentary.

body.bibl: Haelewyck, Jean-Claude. “Historia Zosimi de Vita Beatorum Rechabitarum. Édition de La Version Syriaque Brève.” Le Muséon 127:1-2 (2014): 95–147.
Jean-Claude Haelewyck, Historia Zosimi de Vita Beatorum Rechabitarum. Édition de La Version Syriaque Brève,” Le Muséon 127:1-2 (2014): 95–147.
